data.title: Bureau of Cannabis Control Announces Enforcement Action on Unlicensed Delivery Service in Sacramento
data.excerpt: The Bureau of Cannabis Control and the Department of Consumer Affairs’ Division of Investigation-Cannabis Enforcement Unit today announced enforcement action on an unlicensed cannabis business operating in Sacramento.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
